summary.title: Colorectal Cancer Liver Metastases (CRLM) Surgical Outcomes
summary.abstract: Clinical outcome data for 1500 patients undergoing liver resection for colorectal metastases. Variables include margin status, recurrence patterns, and 5-year survival.

project.projectName: CRLM-SURG: Surgical Management and Outcomes in Colorectal Liver Metastases
project.leadResearchInstitute: University College London Hospitals (UCLH) NHS Foundation Trust
project.projectScope: Clinical and surgical outcome data for patients undergoing hepatic resection for metastatic colorectal cancer.
